title: Tommy Jeans teams up with Amazon Fashion to launch vintage inspired denim range
text:

If you need a new pair of jeans for your winter wardrobe, then you're in luck.

Amazon Fashion and Tommy Jeans have collaborated to create a new denim collection for men and women that is exclusively available at Amazon.

The five-piece range draws inspiration from the vintage era when Tommy Hilfiger first started his brand and sits on Amazon Fashion's dedicated denim hub, Destination Denim - which is designed to help shoppers find their perfect pair of jeans.

Fans of the iconic fashion label can expect to see stone-washed styles that dominated closets and clothing stores in the late 80s and 90s, from two-tone colour blocking jackets to high-rise jeans.

The limited-edition collection incorporates heritage fabrics with combinations of different indigo blues to create the ultimate standout pieces for the new season.

Here are some pieces from the range that you can shop now.

Men's Oversized Trucker Denim Jacket, £95

This baggy trucker jacket for men oozes classic 90s vibes.

We love that its relaxed proportions and two-tone colour blocking will look good with practically everything.

Buy it now at amazon.co.uk

Women's Cropped Trucker Denim Jacket, £95

Women can get a similar look in this cropped offering that's made from stretchy materials.

Buy it now at amazon.co.uk

Men's Scanton Heritage Slim Jeans, £90

Featuring a zip fly, this new version of the iconic and best-selling Scanton jeans is designed to be paired with the Oversized Trucker Denim Jacket above.

Buy it now at amazon.co.uk

Women's Dungaree Dress, £80

Your off-duty look, sorted. This breezy dungaree dress is ideal for wearing over a plain white t-shirt and tights.

Buy it now at amazon.co.uk

description: Get the vintage look with the new five-piece Tommy Jeans collection that is exclusively available at Amazon now
